page.title: 20CONCLUSION OF APEDALE
page.content:
This Domesday Block in Apedale is essentially a rural area with no industry apart from those allied to, and connected with the land. People live in isolated spots and there is no community centre where they can gather to exchange news and views. They have to travel out of the area to do this---at least 7 miles. Activities of individuals are very varied and we have tried to give examples of these.
Contributors:- M.Astley. M.Cockin. M.Dale. S.Fildes. F.Jones. H.Jones. B.Kelsall. M.Lippitt. R.Neale. B.Pogson.R.Sykes. B.Vaughan. Editor:-B.Pogson.
